import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Dashboard.css'; const Dashboard = ({ user, onLogout }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(true); const menuItems = [ { id: 'overview', label: 'ğŸ“Š Overview', icon: 'ğŸ“Š' }, { id: 'profile', label: 'ğŸ‘¤ Profile', icon: 'ğŸ‘¤' }, { id: 'attendance', label: 'â° Attendance', icon: 'â°' }, { id: 'leave', label: 'ğŸ–ï¸ Leave Management', icon: 'ğŸ–ï¸' }, { id: 'payroll', label: 'ğŸ’° Payroll', icon: 'ğŸ’°' }, { id: 'performance', label: 'ğŸ“ˆ Performance', icon: 'ğŸ“ˆ' }, ...(user?.role === 'admin' ? [ { id: 'employees', label: 'ğŸ‘¥ Employee Management', icon: 'ğŸ‘¥' }, { id: 'reports', label: 'ğŸ“‹ Reports', icon: 'ğŸ“‹' } ] : []) ]; const renderContent = () => { switch (activeTab) { case 'overview': return ; case 'profile': return ; case 'attendance': return ; case 'leave': return ; case 'payroll': return ; case 'performance': return ; case 'employees': return ; case 'reports': return ; default: return ; } }; return (
